name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT

quotes.show: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
quotes.quote: You know what, I wish I could give everyone a happy ending. But life isn't some romantic anime and I can't fix what's wrong in life stumbling around being oblivious and nice all the time.

quotes.show: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
quotes.quote: There are two kinds of girls in this world. Lovely girls who can get along with me. And all the bitches who can't
